[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/scheduler.rs] [Function: wait_for_dependency()] [Mutex acquisition order] The function acquires dependency mutex then status mutex - can this ordering deadlock with other functions that acquire in opposite order? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/scheduler.rs] [Function: wait_for_dependency()] [Condvar creation] Is creating a new Arc<(Mutex, Condvar)> for each dependency efficient, or can memory allocation failures cause panics that corrupt scheduler state? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/scheduler.rs] [Function: wake_dependencies_after_execution()] [Vector take operation] Does mem::take() on stored_deps properly clear the vector while holding the lock, or can concurrent wait_for_dependency add dependencies that get lost? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/scheduler.rs] [Function: wake_dependencies_after_execution()] [Fetch_min timing] Is calling fetch_min after all resume() calls the correct order, or should it be called before to ensure dependencies can grab the decreased execution index? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/scheduler.rs] [Field: txn_dependency] [Vector capacity] Can txn_dependency vectors grow unboundedly if transactions are repeatedly aborted, causing memory exhaustion attacks? (Medium)
